mapper.insert:
insert into frontend_board (content_title, content_detail, content_uploader, content_reg_date, content_lang_name) values (#{contentTitle}, #{contentDetail}, #{contentUploader}, NOW(), #{contentLangName})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select frontend_board.*, frontend_board_file.file_num file_num, file_name, target_content_num, frontend_board_comment.comment_num comment_num, comment_uploader, comment_reg_date, comment_detail, comment_target_content_num from frontend_board left join frontend_board_file on (frontend_board.content_num = frontend_board_file.target_content_num) left join frontend_board_comment on (frontend_board.content_num = frontend_board_comment.comment_target_content_num) where frontend_board.content_num = #{content_num}
